features.sectionTitle: All your collecting, in one place
features.sectionSubtitle: Find trusted stores, log purchases, manage pre-orders and track shipments—with a dashboard that shows what's due and what's left to pay.

stores.title: Stores you trust
stores.description: Find stores that match your type of collection and save your favorites in one place. Check references and feedback to buy with confidence.

purchases.title: Orders, all sorted
purchases.description: Log each purchase with store, items, dates and notes without the fuss. Keep a clear history of what you bought and when.

preorders.title: Pre-orders, no surprises
preorders.description: Stay on top of deposits and balances without losing track of partial payments. See what's left to pay and what's due each month.

shipments.title: Shipments in check
shipments.description: Track shipments even when an order ships in parts or on different dates. See what's pending, what shipped and what's delivered.

reminders.heading: Handy reminders and alerts
reminders.description: Get reminders to request updates and not forget long pre-orders. Set a budget and get alerts when you're approaching your limit.

userFit.title: Is PandaTrack right for me?
userFit.subtitle: If you love collecting but keeping track of your purchases has become chaos… yes, this is for you.

card1.title: Where did that purchase go?
card1.description: Bought on Instagram, paid via WhatsApp, confirmation in your inbox… and now it’s lost in chats and screenshots. If that sounds familiar, you know the stress.

card2.title: What do I have on the way?
card2.description: Some orders arrive fast, others sit in “limbo” for weeks. And there you are again: “what’s the status of my order?”. Don’t worry—you’re not alone.

card3.title: No more surprise payments
card3.description: Pre-order here, 20% deposit there, “the rest when it arrives”… until a payment shows up you didn’t see coming. Having it clear ahead of time feels amazing.

hero.title: PandaTrack: your command center for shopping and collectibles
hero.subtitle: Track stores, purchases, and shipments; keep your collection updated and save what you want on your wishlist. Everything in one place.
